# Locale.Region.Category

**Structure**

Categories of a region. See https://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/tr35-35/tr35-info.html#Territory_Data

## Declaration

```swift
struct Category
```

## Type Properties

- **continent**: Category representing a continent, regions contained directly by world.
- **grouping**: Category representing a grouping, regions that has a well defined membership.
- **subcontinent**: Category representing a sub-continent, regions contained directly by a continent.
- **territory**: Category representing a territory.
- **world**: Category representing the whold world.

## Conforms To

- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
